document.full_text: former federal reserve chairman paul volcker warned on friday that trillion-dollar deficits posed a threat to the stability of the u.s. economy and the dollar, and said he is frustrated by the gridlock in washington.
document.title: volcker warns of danger from u.s. deficits
lines_and_colors: former federal reserve chairman paul volcker warned on friday that trillion-dollar deficits posed a threat to the stability of the u.s. economy and the dollar, and said he is frustrated by the gridlock in washington.
